location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.3580 of 1854 from Henry Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to Captain Arnold Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter and its enclosure relate to hostilities between vessels owned by the people of Shargah and Sirayunah (the origins of this latter place being unclear). The letter encloses an extract of paragraph 45 of letter no.13 from the Honourable Court of Directors, dated 27 April 1854, in which it is stated that Captain Kemballâ€™s proceedings in the case were judicious and successful.
